thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 29 of 64
thread.title: HD

author: HD
title: HD
text: I love Ssense for it products and easy to use interface. So, I purchased a pair of Opening Ceremony sneakers from their site. They came promptly in the mail. I opened up the package to find the shoebox completely torn up. The product was in good condition, but I expect every detail to be looked after when I purchase a $300 product. A shoe box that is ripped and taped back together makes me feel like a full 5 stars is undeserved.
